DOC.brief_summary: This randomise controlled trial conduct eastern Thailand group school approximately 2,000 student age 7-15 year . Pre-fabricated school uniform commercially treated ensure consistent high quality insecticide impregnation permethrin . A double-blind randomised cross-over trial school level cover two dengue transmission season .
